text: The Amati Girls is a 2001 American drama movie directed by Anne De Salvo and starring Cloris Leachman, Mercedes Ruehl, Paul Sorvino, Mark Harmon, Sean Young, Dinah Manoff, Lee Grant, Sal Viscuso, Jay Acovone, Sam McMurray, Mary Winston, Robert Picardo. ==Other websites== * * Category:2001 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Philadelphia
title: The Amati Girls
